portfolio.summary: My name is Christopher Robidas. I've been a gamer since I was old enough to hold a controller, and I'm a passionate video game programmer. I am known as a good team player and for my great ability to communicate, adapt, and learn.
portfolio.current-role-value: Back End Developer at Gameloft Montreal
portfolio.education-value: Bachelor of Computer Science - University of Sherbrooke
portfolio.project-tasks: I worked on the following features:

project-test.summary: Five Nights at Freddy's like game where you must cheat during an exam without being caught by your teacher. Made for the Game Jam Sherbrooke 2024.
project-test.task2: End game UI menus displaying the player's game result.
project-test.task3: The tigger jumpscare causing the player to lose the game.
project-test.task4: Display mode and resolution settings and the UI to change them (not showing in the WebGL version).

project-sauve-chouris.summary: Adventure and horror game where you need to save your bat friend while avoiding to get caugh by a grandma and her cat. Made for the Game Jam Sherbrooke 2023.
project-sauve-chouris.task1: Echolocation game mechanic used to find your way in the levels.
project-sauve-chouris.task2: Main menu, level selection menu, pause menu and game over menu.
project-sauve-chouris.task3: Cutscenes logic displaying the images and text.
project-sauve-chouris.skills: Technical skills: Unity, C# and Wwise

project-purrfect-escape.summary: Escape game where you play as a cat wanting to escape from his house, but needs to solve puzzles to do so.
project-purrfect-escape.task1: Interaction system with the little circles and cat paw indicating the players the items they can interact with.
project-purrfect-escape.task2: Little screen and the buttons on the wall to input the secret code.
project-purrfect-escape.task3: Level design including deciding the house layout and the puzzles and key items locations.

project-stepping-stones.summary: Runner where you travel through the ages to bring back our history. Made for the Montreal Game Jam 2023.
project-stepping-stones.task1: Character controller that runs automatically, can jump, can use a torch to burn walls and can block meteors with a shield.
project-stepping-stones.task2: Infinite procedural level generation changing appearance depending on the age.
project-stepping-stones.task3: Integrate models, animations, interfaces and the audio made by my colleagues
project-stepping-stones.skills: Technical skills: Unreal Engine, C++, Blueprints and Wwise
